main event: A UFO was observed in Saratoga, California on December 7, 1968, for approximately 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as circular/oval and appeared stationary before moving up and away., Witnesses reported the object emitted a bright light and was visible in the sky., A handwritten letter indicated another sighting dated December 23, 1968, also in Los Gatos, California., Witnesses mentioned seeing a pulsating light and observing erratic movements at a high speed., The sighting details were documented in a letter from the USAF's Aerial Phenomena Office asking for more information.
sighted object: a circular/oval UFO emitting a bright light
witness description: A civilian who observed the object close to Highway 9.
